'''Marc Gunn''' is a Santa Ana, California-based musician and former member of the [[Brobdingnagian Bards]]. Gunn has written several songs inspired by [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]], including 2011's [[Don't Go Drinking With Hobbits]], an album of hobbit drinking songs. Many of the songs on that album were co-written with fantasy author Rie Sheridan Rose.
